title: Client is NOT functioning.
body:
Long story short I can't use the features of the client , because it's way too laggy and the thing is that it was working all good since yesterday.
Today I had the luck to play a few games and it was pathetic. I used to play with up to 400 fps and today I was on 60.
I don't know what is happening with the server or specifically my launcher , but that is abnormal and I do hope somebody will find the fix.
Before you start posting ''msg support'' and etc. know that I already did and they gave me a list of around 10 steps whom I did..yet nothing changed.

P.S.
Fix your game Riot , for the love of your players {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:13}} {{summoner:4}} .

replies.body: They are still trying but it's pointless , nothing helps.

Reaching out to our tech team in a ticket was a solid plan, they're able to get more context and help you individually.  If the steps provided didn't help, it's okay!  Just let them know in your ticket and they'll keep helping out until we get to the bottom of this!
